Title: TS-19
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Adam Fierro, Frank Darabont
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Jon Bernthal, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden
Plot: The survivors gain access to the C.D.C. in the hope of a safe haven.
